name: Against the Door
description:
Against the Door

I woke up at night.
No sounds.
No tears.
No you.

Just a door.

It's all against the door.
It's all against that door.

Many years ago, I heard a voice.
Now, it's time to answer.
This is not the same voice anymore.
This is years before that voice.

Then, against all the odds, I saw you.
Against the door.

It's time to hear.
It's time to open the door.

a
